content: > want more beautiful free patterns sign up for our newsletter 2 and follow us on instagram @eweknitto 3 so you never miss a pattern > find the kit here 4 designer by claudia q this is a simple pullover that is sure to become a wardrobe staple comprised of mainly stockinette the real design is in the subtle ombre effect which can been as subtle or as bright as you like it s perfect when you want to stay cozy and stylish sizes xs s m l xl 2x 3x 4x to be worn with 6 / 15cm positive ease shown in size xs finished measurements bust circumference 36 1/4 40 44 1/4 48 52 1/4 56 60 1/4 64 / 92 102 112 122 133 142 153 163 cm body length to underarm 10 1/2 10 1/2 11 3/4 11 3/4 13 14 15 15 / 27 27 30 30 33 36 38 38 cm sleeve length to underarm 12 12 12 1/2 12 1/2 13 13 1/2 14 14 / 30 30 32 32 33 34 36 36 cm upper arm 12 1/4 13 1/4 14 1/4 15 1/4 16 17 3/4 19 1/4 20 1/2 / 31 34 36 39 41 45 49 52 cm yoke depth 9 1/4 9 3/4 10 1/4 10 3/4 11 1/4 11 3/4 12 1/4 12 3/4 / 23 25 26 27 29 30 31 32 cm gauge 23 sts & 30 rounds = 4 / 10 cm in stockinette / stocking stitch in the round on a 4 00 mm us 6 needle blocked with 2 strands of yarn held together needles 3 75 mm us 5 circular needle 16 / 40 cm optional 32 / 80 cm or longer for larger sizes and a set of double pointed needles dpns for neckband and sleeve cuffs 4 00 mm us 6 circular needle 24 / 60 cm 32 / 80 cm or longer for larger sizes and a set of double pointed needles dpns or needles required to obtain correct gauge for pattern support patterns@eweknit ca 1 eweknit co 2 https //eweknit-store us7 list-manage com/subscribe/post u=d1440342032269e6f7794a987&id=7952e97f67 3 https //www instagram com/eweknitto/ 4 https //eweknit co/products/velvetpulloverkit
